meanings.definition: Develop (something) in conjunction with another party.
meanings.sent1: We are codeveloping a new app with our partners.
meanings.sent2: The two companies are codeveloping a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent3: Codeveloping this project together is a great way to share ideas.
meanings.sent4: Codeveloping with others can lead to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The process of codeveloping ensures collaboration and teamwork.

meanings.definition: Participate in the joint development of something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys codeveloping new products with her team.
meanings.sent2: They are codeveloping a plan for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: Codeveloping a surprise gift for a friend can be exciting.
meanings.sent4: Codeveloping a dream can make it more achievable.
meanings.sent5: Codeveloping ideas can lead to amazing outcomes.
